summary.span: 指示应用程序的 COM 线程模型是单线程单元 (STA)。

span.span: Indicates that the COM threading model for an application is single-threaded apartment (STA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此特性应用于入口点方法 ( `Main()` C# 和 Visual Basic 中的方法)。Apply this attribute to the entry point method (the `Main()` method in C# and Visual Basic). 它具有不会影响其他方法。It has no effect on other methods. 若要设置在你的代码中启动的线程的单元状态，使用或方法，然后再启动线程。To set the apartment state of threads you start in your code, use the or method before starting the thread. > [!NOTE] > 有关 COM 线程模型的概述，请参阅[了解和使用 COM 线程处理模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms809971.aspx)。For an overview of COM threading models, see [Understanding and Using COM Threading Models](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms809971.aspx). COM 线程处理模型仅适用于使用 COM 互操作的应用程序。COM threading models only apply to applications that use COM interop. COM 线程模型可以设置为单线程单元或多线程的单元。The COM threading model can be set to single-threaded apartment or multithreaded apartment. 如果线程实际进行对 COM 组件的调用，仅初始化将应用程序线程为 COM 互操作。The application thread is only initialized for COM interop if the thread actually makes a call to a COM component. 如果未使用 COM 互操作，则该线程不会被初始化，和特性，如果不存在，没有任何影响。If COM interop is not used, then the thread is not initialized, and the attribute, if it is present, has no effect. 线程模型为 COM 互操作的默认值从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，取决于在其中你正在开发应用程序，如下表所示的语言。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the default threading model for COM interop depends on the language in which you are developing your application, as the following table shows. |语言Language|COM 单元模型COM apartment model| |--------------|-------------------------| |C#C#|多线程的单元Multithreaded apartment| |C++C++|多线程的单元Multithreaded apartment| |Visual BasicVisual Basic|单线程单元Single-threaded apartment| 若要更改这些默认设置，请使用要设置的应用程序或调用的线程模型属性或方法，然后再启动线程设置特定线程的线程模型。To change these defaults, you use the attribute to set the threading model for the application, or call the or method before starting the thread to set the threading model for a particular thread. 在 c + +，您还可以使用[/CLRTHREADATTRIBUTE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4907e9ef-5031-446c-aecf-0a0b32fae1e8)链接器选项以指定的单元模型。In C++, you can also use the [/CLRTHREADATTRIBUTE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4907e9ef-5031-446c-aecf-0a0b32fae1e8) linker option to specify the apartment model. ASP.NET 应用程序应设置`ASPCompat`属性[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指令至`true`强制页后，可以 STA 线程池提供服务。ASP.NET applications should set the `ASPCompat` attribute of the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive to `true` to force the page to be serviced by the STA thread pool. 下面是一些在其中你将想要使用的事例将线程模型显式设置为单线程单元的属性：Here are some of the cases in which you’ll want to use the attribute to explicitly set the threading model to single-threaded apartment: - 你要开发 Windows 窗体应用程序。You're developing a Windows Forms app. Windows 窗体应用程序必须是单线程方式如果它们与通信 Windows 系统组件，如剪贴板或 Windows 通用对话框，或如果它们使用系统功能，如拖放功能。Windows Forms apps must be single-threaded if they communicate with Windows system components such as the Clipboard or Windows common dialog boxes, or if they use system features such as drag-and-drop functionality. 对于 C# Windows 窗体应用程序模板自动添加归于 C# 项目。The Windows Forms Application template for C# automatically adds the attribute to C# projects. 单线程单元模型是 Visual Basic 的默认值，因为没有必要的属性。Because the single-threaded apartment model is the default for Visual Basic, there is no need for the attribute. - 在开发 C# 应用调用一个 Visual Basic 库，其中，反过来，依赖于 COM 互操作。You're developing a C# app that calls a Visual Basic library, which, in turn, relies on COM interop. 因为单线程单元模型是 Visual Basic 的默认设置，你应您的应用程序的线程处理模型使用更改为单线程方式属性。Because the single-threaded apartment model is the default for Visual Basic, you should change your app's threading model to single-threaded by using the attribute. - 你的应用程序可以对使用单线程单元模型的 COM 组件的调用。Your application makes calls to COM components that use the single-threaded apartment model.
